display_long_description:
They erased her. Now you erase them.

**“An instant cult classic.” – XRGamer (9.5/10)**
**“Relentless gun-fu. Immersive hacking.” – WickedVRGamer (9/10)**
**“A must-play in Cyberpunk VR.” – BMFVR**

Cortex created the brain chip that makes superhumans.
Your girlfriend exposed the truth. They erased her.
You were next — until a rogue hacker pulled you from the edge.

Now you're trained. You're pissed.
You're heading back into the city to shut it all down.

UPDATED SUMMER 2025 – Key Features

A CYBERPUNK NOIR STORY

A VR revenge thriller soaked in neon, betrayal, and bullets.
[media]

CORTEX COMBAT ENGINE™ 2.0

Bullet-time melee. Tactical shootouts. Kill Rooms, Sandbox & Story modes.
[media]

FREE ROAM OR FULL STORY

Fight bosses. Breach Cortex facilities. Discover hidden zones.

Your path. Your war.

[media]

Play now. It’s time for vengeance.
